name: SSR-Modules Repo
description: An amazing Magisk Modules Repository that aims to bring you any Magisk Modules in a single Repo! How cool is that uh? :P Any Submissions are greatly appreciated!

modules.name: BetterKnownInstalled (BKI)
modules.author: @T3SL4
modules.description: Patching (installer, installerUid, installInitiator, installOriginator) in packages.xml and cleaning packaga-warnings.xml for defeating DroidGuard: UNKNOWN_INSTALLED

note.message: Installation from recovery is not supported. You must install this module from within a running Android environment (Magisk/KernelSU/APatch)
note.title: Important!

modules.name: ✨ COPG spoof ✨
modules.author: AlirezaParsi
modules.description: Spoof your device for games to unlock max fps.

modules.name: Malwack | Anti-Malware & Ad Blocker
modules.author: Person0z
modules.description: Ever wanted to get rid of those annoying ads that pop every 2 seconds in mobile games you're playing or websites you are visiting? Well, look no further with Malwack, your defense against ads!

modules.name: 内存优化
modules.author: 焕晨HChen
modules.description: 内存参数调整，以实现更佳的内存使用效率。

modules.name: Play Integrity Fix
modules.author: chiteroman
modules.description: Universal modular fix for Play Integrity (and SafetyNet) on devices running Android 8-15

modules.name: Re-Malwack | Not just a normal ad-blocker module ✨
modules.author: ZG089
modules.description: A fully-fledged ad-block module. Contains all your needs ✨

modules.name: Systemless Debloater
modules.author: zgfg @ xda
modules.description: Select and debloat preinstalled system apps. Successfully tested on up to SAR, Dynamic partitions and A13. Module must be installed through Magisk app, not TWRP - see OP instructions in the XDA thread.

modules.name: Tricky Addon - Update Target List
modules.author: KOWX712
modules.description: A WebUI to conifgure tricky store target.txt

note.message: This module is not a part of the Tricky Store module. DO NOT report any issues to Tricky Store if encountered

modules.name: Google Photos Unlimited backup
modules.author: Kolassrexon J
modules.description: Adds Photos features and unlimited Google Photos original backup quality by spoof device info to Pixel XL only on Photos app.

modules.name: Xtreme Battery Saver
modules.author: DethByte64
modules.description: An extreme battery saver for Magisk users who really want to stretch their battery life

modules.name: Anti bootloop
modules.author: nedorazrab0
modules.description: Bootloop protection

modules.name: ADB & Fastboot for Android NDK
modules.author: osm0sis & Surge1223 @ xda-developers
modules.description: Static arm/arm64 adb and fastboot binaries for Android built with the NDK

modules.name: bindhosts
modules.author: xx, KOWX712
modules.description: Systemless hosts for APatch, KernelSU and Magisk

modules.name: chroot-distro
modules.author: @YasserNull
modules.description: install linux distributions on android

modules.name: Encore Tweaks
modules.author: Rem01Gaming
modules.description: Special performance module for your Device.

modules.name: FlagSecurePatcher
modules.author: j-hc
modules.description: Prevent apps from blocking and listening to your screenshots

modules.name: Magical Overlayfs
modules.author: HuskyDG
modules.description: Use OverlayFS to make read-only system partitions become read-write partitions. OverlayFS MUST be supported by kernel!

modules.name: WiFi Password Viewer for MMRL
modules.author: Der_Googler, veez21 @ xda-developers
modules.description: View all your WiFi passwords and bluetooth devices inside MMRL

modules.name: mountify
modules.author: xx
modules.description: Globally mounted modules and whiteouts via OverlayFS.

modules.name: Net Switch
modules.author: Rem01Gaming
modules.description: Isolate apps from Internet access.

modules.name: SafetyNet sensitive props
modules.author: HuskyDG
modules.description: Reset sensitive properties to safe state and try to bypass Safetynet / Play Integrity

modules.name: App Nuker
modules.author: ChiseWaguri & Contributors
modules.description: description=WebUI-based debloater and whiteout creator

modules.name: Tricky Store
modules.author: 5ec1cff
modules.description: A trick of keystore

modules.name: Universal GMS Doze
modules.author: gloeyisk
modules.description: Patches Google Play services app and certain processes/services to be able to use battery optimizations

modules.name: USB Samplerate Unlocker
modules.author: zyhk
modules.description: USB (HAL) audio class drivers have a limiter of sample rates at 96kHz. This mod unlocks the limiter.

modules.name: VBMeta Fixer
modules.author: Reveny
modules.description: Reset the VBMeta digest property with the correct boot hash to fix detection

modules.name: Video To Bootanimation
modules.author: rhythmcache.t.me
modules.description: set Videos as Bootanimation

modules.name: Zip & ZipSigner for Android NDK
modules.author: osm0sis & topjohnwu @ xda-developers
modules.description: Wrapped dexed zipsigner.jar, and static arm/arm64 zip and zipalign binaries for Android built with the NDK

modules.name: Zygisk Assistant
modules.author: snake-4
modules.description: A Zygisk module to hide root.

modules.name: zygisk-detach

modules.description: Detaches installed apps from Play Store

modules.name: Zygisk - LSPosed
modules.author: LSPosed Developers
modules.description: Another enhanced implementation of Xposed Framework. Supports Android 8.1 ~ 14. Requires Magisk 24.0+ and Zygisk enabled.

modules.name: Zygisk Next
